head.title: Floating Body Is Thought To Be Bridge Worker's

hedline.hl1: Floating Body Is Thought To Be Bridge Worker's

abstract.p: Body found floating in waters south of Manhattan is believed to be that of Antonio Pedro, construction worker who fell to his death from Manhattan Bridge May 2 (S)

block.p: A body found floating in the waters south of Manhattan yesterday is believed to be that of a construction worker who fell to his death from the Manhattan Bridge two weeks ago, the police said.

The Police Department's Harbor Unit found the body at 8:30 a.m. in the water between Governors Island and the Battery, the police said. The officers also retrieved a work vest that fits the description of clothes worn by the worker, Antonio Pedro, 40, who fell 130 feet from the bridge on May 2 and was swept away.
